modName: Asmos Trading Card Collection City Edition
summary: This mod is the first installment of a large compilations of mods created by myself, Asmo, to add a trading card collection to the world of Skyrim. Each installment will have atleast 50 cards to add to the game all with custom values. Hope you enjoy!
descriptionHtml:
NOTE: REQUIRES THE MASTER FILE HERE - http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/40465/?

Bandit Edition is out! Download with the full master collection here! - http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/40465/?

Welcome to the FIRST installment of a soon to be large compilation of mods created by me, Asmo, to add a collection of trading cards to the world of Skyrim. Each set will contain at least 50+ cards with each set having a unique border and text with EVERY SINGLE CARD having its OWN UNIQUE SCREENSHOT to represent the card! I aim to create many more expansions and will put out a special Easter Egg edition when I break 500 cards!

This pack is entitled City Edition. I have gone through Solitude, Windhelm, Whiterun, Markarth, and Riften and individually placed all 55 cards that I have created for this first edition. Some are easy to find, while others not quite so much! There is a book that you will be able to find in the Bannered Mare in Whiterun with possibly your first card located on top of it! This book will tell you the names and the card number of each card that you can find in this first set!

Fan promotion video by the Youtube Channel BestinMods!
http://youtu.be/xXMVWX9sIac

I hope you take the time to enjoy this mod! There should be no conflicts with any other mod created. This mod does not require any of the official DLCs however I will be putting out DLC exclusive cards that will be entitled Dawnguard Deadly Creatures, etc.

Plans for the future?

-Next package will be forest and monstrous creatures.
There will be a various percentage drop chance that a card will come off of a creature that matches the creatures type such as a Giant Frostbite Spider.

-Skyrim Settlements

-Questlines (Dark Brotherhood, Companions, etc...)

-Landmarks Locations

-Settlements

-Vendors

-And much more
author: Asmosia Vivic
